RSA is one of the worldâs leading multinational insurance groups with over 300 years of experience and over 20 million customers worldwide.Our people are committed to building a dynamic internal culture where our people love what they do and feel motivated to keep things moving â for customers, for their colleagues and as part of their own growth and development. In RSA, employing positive people is how we achieve success. You will be working in an environment that encourages you to do great work and you constantly will be faced with fresh challenges that have a direct impact on our business. We believe your personality and passion will keep RSA and our business moving forward. At RSA we have a culture that supports and rewards high performance with a competitive reward policy for top performers.  Our rewards package includes competitive compensation, work / life balance, opportunities to learn and the chance to make a difference working for a worldwide industry leader. Integration Services Technical Leader Your enthusiasm is infectious. You challenge the status quo.  You find solutions to problems.  You go the extra mile to exceed customersâ expectations.  You get things done the right way.  You represent our brand with passion and pride.  You are a team player.  You have fun and you make work fun for those working around you. Your enthusiasm is infectious. You challenge the status quo.  You find solutions to problems.  You go the extra mile to exceed customersâ expectations.  You get things done the right way.  You represent our brand with passion and pride.  You are a team player.  You have fun and you make work fun for those working around you. â¢	Lead your team to the successful delivery of Integration Services/Microservices that will allow for efficient interactions between RSA applications;â¢	Work together with Business Analysts, Enterprise Architects, Project Managers and other project team members to delivery high quality solutions that fulfill our business needs;â¢	Work with Business Analysts and Architects to deliver technical solutions that match functional specifications and business requirements;â¢	Analyze complex to highly complex new functionalities, changes and fixes to determine a technical solution that not only meets immediate needs but future needs as well;â¢	Design APIs and necessary documentation to facilitate server usability;â¢	Follow Scrum methodology to manage your team and your teamâs workload;â¢	Assist in estimation and planning for your teamâs workload;â¢	Review code, ensure best practices are being followed, and code quality is at a high standard;â¢	Support Quality Management team on their testing initiative;â¢	Mentor less experienced developers;â¢	Occasional evening and weekend work maybe required for support purposes. â¢	Collaborate with cross-functional team members â¢	5-10 years of experience developing Java EE applications;â¢	3 or more years of experience as a team leader;â¢	Proficiency in Enterprise Integration Patterns in order to design efficient services and microservices;â¢	Experience with full SDLC and Agile Development lifecycle;â¢	Experience in Mulesoft Anypoint Platform;â¢	Experience with Web Services (SOAP/REST), Messaging (JMS, MQ), FTP/SFTP and Relational Databases (MySQL, MS SQL);â¢	Strong knowledge of Java EE experience with significant Guidewire Integration experience and Guidewire ClaimsCenter Integration experience;â¢	Experience with Application Servers like WebSphere, Weblogic, JBoss and/or Tomcat;â¢	Experience with RSA group of Companies is strongly committed to diversity and welcomes applications from visible minority group members, women, Aboriginal persons, and persons with disabilities, members of the LGBT community, and others who may contribute to the further diversification of ideas.RSA group of Companies will provide reasonable accommodation for qualified individuals with disabilities in the job application process.If you have difficulty using our online application system and you need an accommodation due to a disability, please email AODA@RSAGROUP.CA or call us at toll free 1 (800)-855-0511. Please note this email is only for accommodation requests. Resumes sent to this email address will not be considered.
